src_original: yad utāpekṣāyuktyā,  kāryakaraṇayuktyā,  upapattisādhanayuktyā,  dharmatāyuktyā //  apekṣāyuktiḥ katamā /
yā cotpattyapekṣā yā ca prajñaptyapekṣā sā yuktir yoga upāyaḥ skandhotpattaye skandhaprajñaptaye /  tasmād apekṣāyuktir ity ucyate //
kāryakaraṇayuktiḥ katamā /  yad utpannānāṃ skandhānāṃ svena hetunā svena pratyayena tasmiṃs tasmin svakāryakaraṇe viniyogaḥ /  tadyathā, cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi draṣṭavyāni,
